ValidationRule.description: You can only use RollUpToUltimateParent__c and UltimateParentLookup(Text)__c together
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(RollupToUltimateParent__c), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(UltimateParentLookup__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(UltimateParentLookupText__c)) ) ), AND( RollupToUltimateParent__c, ISBLANK(UltimateParentLookup__c), ISBLANK(UltimateParentLookupText__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only use RollUpToUltimateParent__c and UltimateParentLookup(Text)__c together!
